name: Nomads of the Flashmarble Cavern
description: Hailing from the Amethyst Mines, the Nomads of the Flashmarble Cavern are known for their exceptional flashmarble craftsmanship. Now, after unfurling a cursed scroll and discovering secrets few others in Kharth know, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
